Action.Name: DlgSelectPackages.GetCategoryProperties
Action.Description: Gets the properties of a package category within the select packages control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: PackageControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the select packages control who's category properties you want.

Arg.Name: CategoryControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the package category who's properties you want.

Action.Name: DlgSelectPackages.SetCategoryProperties
Action.Description: Sets the properties of a package category within the select packages control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: PackageControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the select packages control who's category properties you want to set.

Arg.Name: CategoryControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the package category who's properties you want to set.

Arg.Name: Properties
Arg.Description: A table containing the control properties you want to set.

Action.Name: DlgSelectPackages.UpdateDisplay
Action.Description: Updates the currently displayed package list based upon the current internal data.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the select packages control who's display you want to update.
